name: Golden Sun Hotel
address: 33 Hang Quat Street, Hoan Kiem, Hanoi, Vietnam, Quận Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Việt Nam
description:
Với phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và nhà hàng, Golden Sun Hotel tọa lạc ở trung tâm Hà Nội, cách Nhà thờ Thánh Joseph 7 phút đi bộ. Khách sạn 3 sao này có quầy lễ tân 24 giờ và bàn bán tour. Chỗ nghỉ này cung cấp bếp chung, dịch vụ phòng và dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ cho khách.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng được trang bị điều hòa có bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Tại Golden Sun Hotel, tất cả các phòng đều được thiết kế có ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Hằng ngày, chỗ nghỉ có các lựa chọn thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa cho bữa sáng.

Chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ là ủi và tiện nghi cho doanh nhân như fax và photocopy.

Các điểm tham quan nổi tiếng gần Golden Sun Hotel bao gồm Nhà hát múa rối Thăng Long, Hồ Hoàn Kiếm và Ô Quan Chưởng. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Nội Bài, cách khách sạn 24 km, đồng thời chỗ nghỉ có cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Отель расположен в самом сердце города. Рядом куча всего!!! Магазины, кафе рестораны. Гостиница уставшая немного. Очень понравились завтраки, хоть скромные, но готовят все всежее при тебе. Номера небольшие, но достаточно уютные. Все чисто, постельное, полотенца. Кровать удобная. В нашем номере небыло по сути окна, окошко было в ванной комнате для проветривания и выходило оно в какуюто шахту. У родилетей номер был с балкончиком, но на болконе были высокие стены и вид был на стену, по сути только можно было увидеть полоску неба с балкона. В ванной чисто. Для кратковременного размещения вполне достойно. Мы были одну ночь.
review.comment_negative: отсутсвтие окна

review.rating: As great a facility and staff you could ever wish for!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: I loved everything about my initial stay so much that I used Golden Sun as my home base during my month long travels. Everything is five stars.  Convenience, located centrally in Old Quarter (yet manages to be on a quieter lane), every staff member is friendly, professional, helpful, hard working and kind beyond belief.  The facilities are super clean, modern and well-maintained.  If that was not enough, they provide logistical and transit services, reasonably priced, timely and reliable, same for laundry service and last but not least, a superb free breakfast with fresh local fruit, juices, strong coffee and even an excellent Pho to start your day, with Western food options if preferred.  I highly recommend Golden Sun for solo travelers, couples, small groups or families. You will be treated like an old friend from the start.  Five VERY big stars.  Highly recommended!

review.rating: Bien placé, dans un lieu confortable avec un bon service client.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
L’établissement est très bien situé puisqu’il se trouve dans la vielle ville. Vous êtes assez éloigné des ruelles animés pour ne pas être dérangé le soir mais vous pouvez aussi les rejoindre (à pied) en seulement quelques minutes.
Concernant les chambres, elles sont grandes, bien entretenues et confortables.
Enfin, le personnel et surtout le gérant, seront toujours à votre disposition en cas de besoin. Peu importe la demande, ils essaieront au mieux de vous aider. Par exemple, un soir, des clients faisaient du tapage nocturne. À la suite de mon appel, le gérant, a été très réactif et est intervenu. Le lendemain, il m’a même proposé de changer d’étage pour ne plus être dérangé. Durant mon séjour, il a aussi essayé de m’aider dans la vente de ma moto et il m’a aussi réservé un taxi pour l’aéroport à moindre coût.
En résumé, vous êtes bien placé, dans un lieu confortable avec un bon service client.
review.comment_negative: Ayant entendu de nombreuses fois des bruits dans les couloirs, j’ai l’impression que les chambres sont mal insonorisées. Toutefois, il faut nuancer mon propos, car il est possible que les personnes concernées aient été particulièrement bruyante.

review.comment_positive:
객실 깨끗함. 
로비 여직원 아주 친절하고
영어의사소통가능.
조식이 감동. 과일도 많고, 고기랑 소세지도 굽지않고 데쳐내어 기름지지 않아 아주 좋았음. 서빙하는 젊은처자가 참 착하고 고마워 테이블 위에 소량의 팁을 올려두고 나옴.

더 감동인 것은 다낭으로 가기 위해 맡겨둔 짐을 찾은 후 그랩을 부름. 직원이 호텔 밖에까지 나와서 같이 기다려주고 그랩 차번호까지 확인해 주고 트렁크에 캐리어까지 넣어주기까지함. 직원들의 마음 씀씀이에 넘 감동받음^^

review.comment_positive:
房間還算大，床鋪舒適，乾淨衛生，室內燈光明亮，插座數量充足，擺放物品的桌面空間還算足夠

Hotel is responsive with messages via booking.com (i arrived late as the bus from Sapa reached quite late and was worried that the hotel will not let us in, so i alerted them that i will arrive by 12 midnight and they waited). Noise wise- yes its at a busy street but somehow we managed to sleep well- wasnt really noisy (we went during new years celebrbation)

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Lo mejor es su ubicación, sus empleados y su precio. Está en el corazón del old town, puedes ir andando al mercado nocturno, al Ngoc Son Temple o donde sea. La calle donde da es mucho más calmada que las de su alrededor. No hay tanto ruido ni tanto caos. Aún así nosotros escogimos una habitación interior por si acaso.
review.comment_negative: Aunque todo está bien hay algunas cosas que podrían mejorar. Para nosotros la primera sería las puertas de las habitaciones, tendrían que ser más estancas. Aunque el ruido de la calle no llega a las habitaciones interiores, si que se escucha cómo bajan escaleras o cierran sus puertas los otros usuarios. Pasa lo mismo con la habitación del baño, que se oye todo (hay rendija enorme). La otra es la posición del aire acondicionado. Va directo a la cama y está cerca. Hace ruido y el viento frio por la noche no es bueno. Pero no se puede dormir sin él por el calor. Si estuviera en otro sitio se podría dormir mejor.

review.comment_positive: I stayed at this hotel for 1 night before flying from Hanoi International Airport and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The staff were super helpful, they helped me with my bags up to the room and out to the taxi. They booked a taxi for me to the airport (which was cheaper than Grab taxis) and also printed out some documents I needed for my flight. The room was clean and comfortable, everything I needed was provided! The staff were very polite, I have no complaints! I would recommend to stay here before either flying to the airport or just staying in Hanoi city centre! It is in a really good location/ close to everything you’d need. Thank you for all your help, from a solo traveller :)

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is close to the old city, but in an alley behind the business district, and the alley is very dark at night.
The lady who served breakfast was very polite and gentle.
飯店距離老城區商圈近,但在後巷處,深夜非常暗,要注意安全。女士服務員很親切友善
review.comment_negative:
When I checked in at 2:30 pm, the waiter (a man in charge) was very aggressive, had a bad tone, and didn't smile at all.
A polite and friendly lady at the counter, seeing that I had many family members waiting and a lot of luggage, told me that I could choose to pay right away or pay when I check out, but the male waiter suddenly rushed over, loud and rude, and said NO! NO! Pay now! Pay now! They will be busy tomorrow.
The friendly lady apologized to me, she felt embarrassed and I had to rush to check in.But the man in charge turned a blind eye and didn't even welcome my family to sit down and wait, so all  people stood in the lobby and waited for more than 15 minutes, including my old grandmother!
A very terrible check-in experience.When I checked out the next day, the counter was not busy at all！ there were no other passengers at all, and there was only one other passenger's luggage left.The male waiter who was in charge was really rude to the passengers. When I checked out, he suddenly became smiling and asked me many times to check in with him during the booking process. Give him five stars....
But the friendly lady and another male waiter (wearing glasses) helped open the door and pick up the luggage quickly. I am still very grateful for their help.
The triple room has adequate space, but the twin Room is very narrow (my brother is 183cm tall and needs to be very careful not to fall under the bed when he rolls over, but also to be careful not to hit the family members next to him)
The double bed Room facing the street was extremely noisy. When the refrigerator was running, the noise lasted for a long time, making it impossible to sleep. Even if the windows are closed, there are still grab bikers chatting and eating barbecue downstairs at 1 o'clock in the middle of the night, right under the room window.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Nuestra estadía aquí fue genial. El personal súper amable nos solucionó un montón de traslados que nos tenían un poco preocupados. Además siempre atentos y enviando WhatsApp para asegurarse que el servicio había sido bueno. El desayuno es completo, hay fruta libre (tres opciones x lo general), panes, algo caliente (salchichas, bacon, etc.), café, leche y jugos. Y algo a elección a la carta que preparan en el momento: alguna sopa y huevos tipo omelette. 
La habitación es amplia y cómoda uy lo mejor que no se escuchan ruidos de las habitaciones vecinas, parece tener buena insonorización. En el baño la ducha funcionaba con buena presión y buena temperatura, tiene secador de pelo pequeño. El aire acondicionado también funcionaba muy bien, ideal en esta ciudad calurosa. Nos cuidaron la maleta por 6 días y cuando la buscamos esperamos en el hotel nuestro próximo traslado que ya habíamos arreglado con ellos y mientras tanto nos permitieron bañarnos. La atención en más que cálida y resolutiva.
review.comment_negative: Por decir, la mampara del baño puede limpiarse un poco mejor. Se notaban las gotas que siempre quedan en las mamparas de los sucesivos usos. Pero solo un detalle que no opaco nuestra estadía aquí y la amabilidad del personal.

review.comment_positive:
Mitten in der quirligen Altstadt von Hanoi gelegen, trotzdem angenehm ruhig. Nur die Zimmer zur Straße haben  ( schalldämmende Doppel- !!! ) fenster.
Fußläufig zum See und zum Wasserpuppentheater ( sehenswert ).
Sehr gutes Frühstück, toller Kaffee.
Warmes Wasser in der Dusche.
Gutes WLAN.
Betten hart aber gut.
Überaus freundliche und hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter mit guten Englischkenntnissen.
review.comment_negative:
Die vereinbarte Abholung vom Flughafen hat leider nicht geklappt. Der Mitarbeiter, der es verbockt hat, wurde angeblich gleich entlassen. Raue Sitten, wenn's denn wirklich so gelaufen ist.....
Wir haben ein bisschen rumgesucht und uns dann ein Taxi genommen.

review.comment_negative: Nothing really

review.rating: Hotel well worth the price in a great location.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Hotel is in ideal area for walking to many sites. 4 minute walk to the lake.  Not the fault of the hotel but it can be noisy due to other guests lack of courtesy. All room are off a center spiral staircase so sound traveled far. We were on the 3rd floor and could easily hear guests on 1st floor talking in reception area. Best part of the accommodation was the genuinely nice staff. Always rushed to get the door for us when they saw us coming or going and always pleasant. Wifi dropped out quiet frequently.  Not sure if it was just an issue during our stay or an ongoing issue. It wasn’t imperative to us so I didn’t mention it to staff.
review.comment_negative: The layout of the building made for poor acoustics so that sound traveled far.  Bring earplugs if you’re a light sleeper. Hopefully you won’t encounter the rude guest having a 15 minute conversation in the hallway on speaker phone late in the evening like we did.

Le personnel est très professionnel et attentif à ce que notre séjour se passe pour le mieux.
Si nous revenons à Hanoi, nous reviendrons ici.

review.rating: Wonderful hotel with great staff and perfect location
review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
Comfortable and quiet room. We were given a bigger room as we were travelling with a toddler and a baby and it was great as they had a bit more space to run around. Much appreciated! 
The owner and staff extremely helpful and attentive and spoke very good English. 
The breakfast was great! Lots of options and everything very tasty! I think previous reviews didn’t rate it high and I have no idea why?! All the western options and also noodle soups were on the menu. 
Location very close to the lake and all the attractions. 
Great value for money and we highly recommend this hotel! 
Thanks for having us and for making us feel so welcome on our first days in Vietnam:)
Natalia and Jason

review.comment_positive:
Located in the heart of the city, most places are walking distance. 
Nice rooms, good breakfast options - mix of western and Vietnamese. The staff are absolutely fabulous. Would like to call out an instance of great service.  One evening because of unseasonal rains the entrance to the hotel was blocked with rain water and there was no way to get in without getting shoes wet. My family and a few other guests belonging to the neighbouring hotel arrived there. The staff noticed this, the staff from the neighbouring hotel simply told their guests that the water will flow away in some time and they should wait. The staff at golden Sun went in and got some low plastic stools and placed them in the water, making it possible to enter the hotel without wetting our shoes/feet. Now that's what u call customer service.

A equipa é das mais simpaticas e disponiveis que já conheci! Sempre prontos a ajudarem tudo.
Fomos muito bem recebidos.
Muito obrigado

review.rating: 훌륭하고 성의 넘치는 조식의 구시가지 미니 호텔
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
1.가장 인상적인 점은 숙박료에 포함된 조식.
지금까지 수십년 간 다녀 본 budget 개인 자유여행 중
가장 높은 품질의, 성의 있는 조식 제공이었다.
늦게 가도 떨어진 메뉴가 거의 없이 바로 바로 아낌없이 채워 주는데, 이 또한 중저가 3성급 숙소에선 드문 서비스다
2. 하노이 구시가지에 위치해 왠만한 곳은 걸어 다닐만 했다. 
3. 직원들이 친절하고 웃는 표정으로 대한다. 특히 조식 서비스하는 직원들이 투숙객들을 세심하게 대한다.
review.comment_negative:
1. 배정 받은 방이 창문이 없어 밤인지 낮인지 구분이 힘들었는데, 이건 부킹닷컴 객실에서 종종 있는 경우다
2. 베트남에선 보통 체크 아웃 때 숙박료를 내는데
내 습관대로 체크인 하며 선지불했다. 잔돈이 없다며 
다음 날 거스름 돈을 주겠다고 했으나 그 후론 말이 없었다.
천원 남짓한 잔 돈이지만, 돈 계산은 정확했으면 한다

review.comment_positive:
Tôi có đặt phòng của khách sạn qua booking .com, thực sự rất hài lòng về cách phục vụ của nhân viên khách sạn. 
Nhân viên thân thiện, và cởi mở, hướng dẫn tận tình và chỉ cho chúng tôi những nơi đẹp quanh Hà Nội để thăm quan.
Phòng khách sạn rất sạch sẽ , thoáng rộng, ngủ rất ngon giấc.
Khách sạn nằm ở vị trí trung tâm phố cổ nên rất tiện lợi để đi chơi và mất 2 phút đi bộ là tới Hồ Hoàn Kiếm. 
Thực sự cảm ơn Khách Sạn Golden Sun Hotel & Spa , có dịp qua Hà Nội chúng tôi sẽ quay lại nơi đây.

第一次的越南行就是入住這裡。

飯店的經理和所有人員都很謙和友善，讓人沒有壓力。

很晚才下去吃早餐，但沒有因為時間快到就把東西收起來，或只剩一點點，早餐好吃，還提供客製小餐點，沒有吃太多，因為想留點空間去吃河粉和米線。

地點方便，就位於最好逛的古城區域，稍微走一下就可以到很多人都換錢的店家。

review.comment_positive: Потрясающе услужливый персонал отеля! В день отъезда нам нужно было выезжать в 3.30 ночи, и нам любезно предложили собрать завтрак с собой, очень приятный жест с их стороны. Так же персонал отеля помогает с трансфером в аэропорт, с экскурсиями (бухта Халонг) по среднему для ханоя ценнику. Завтрак состоит из двух опций-шведский стол и заказ по меню (омлеты, яйца и тд, даже фо бо).
review.comment_negative: В общих зонах начинают шуметь со времени начала завтрака (6:30 утра), а акустика довольно хорошая, на 5м этаже было слышно. Но это конечно скорее постояльцы такие, а не отель.

review.comment_positive: If I could give more than 10 stars for the location, I would! It was so close and easy to get to from anywhere around the old quarter. The staff was very friendly, accommodating and warm. They also helped me with information on tours and booking the ones I wanted to go to. On my first day, I had a local number but did not know what the number actually was to be able to register myself on grab. The receptionist on the day was so helpful in trying to work it out for me. she also gave me excellent suggestions to go around the area for coffee and food.

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive:
직원분 영어 어느 정도 좔 하시고 굉장히 친절하십니다. 숙소 깨끗하고 하우스키핑 해주십니다. 방이 남으면 무료로 업그레이드 해주시는 것 같습니다.
패밀리 예약했는데 제일 옥탑방으로 넓은 곳으로 바꿔주셨어요. 위치도 호안끼엠 안이라서 어디 나가기도 편했습니다. 더 오래 묵어도 괜찮음. 추천합니다
review.comment_negative: 딱히 없었는데, 깟바 섬에서보다 녹물 많이 나오는듯. 다이소에서 산 필터 헤드 갈색 되는 속도 보고 말하는건데, 딱히 이 호텔만의 문제점은 아닌 거 같음. 베트남 올 땐 필터 2~3개 여분 사서 오길 바람

review.rating: Great place to stay while in Ha Noi
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Very affordable pricing for a hotel near old quarter. For a three star hotel, the amenities and room met our standard, which was a safe and clean place to keep our belongings and sleep at night. We weren’t looking for such an opulent or extravagant hotel. We stayed here twice during our trip- once before we went to sapa and again after we returned from sapa. All the staff were very nice and pleasant. They helped us book our tours and buses to where we needed to go. Gave us recommendations for food and advised us on how to get the best bang for our buck. Breakfast options were sufficient in my opinion. They even upgraded the room from a 1bed to 2bed room on our second stay with them. Given the price I paid and the service they provided, would definitely book with them again if I go to Ha Noi. Highly recommended.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Hotel was in a great location and the staff were super lovely. Very responsive and helped me to book transportation, tours, and even made me a little breakfast to go before my early morning flight. Very happy overall!
review.comment_negative: The rooms felt a bit dated, but I think this might just be symbolic of the location — very close to the old quarter, so everything around seemed to have a similar vibe.

review.comment_positive: This is the best service in Hanoi , They help me a lot about information and book bus tickets to sapa and airport pick up . Definitely recommend. 10/10

review.rating: Great Location and Staff. A safe space in such a lively city like Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The room was nice and the hotel was in great shape. The breakfast was good as well. But what made my stay in this Hotel so good was the personnel. I was struggling with food poisoning and they helped me to reschedule my bus transfer by one day without extra costs. Also, I could prolong my stay with them for another day without any problems. Even though they only serve breakfast I could ask them in the evening on WhatsApp whether they would still have some bread and bananas in the kitchen for me. They then even brought me the food to my room. :) To get better they also gave me a box of ginger tea which also helped a lot. 

Overall a very nice experience. I felt being in a safe space with nice people. Would definitely recommend and visit again. :)

review.rating: A PLEASANT STAY IN HANOI GOLDEN SUN HOTEL OLD QUARTER
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
We stayed 6 nights from 13Feb to 19Feb 2023.
It is an old hotel (everything in Hanoi Old Quarter is old anyway) located 400m walking distance to the popular Hoan Kiem lake( Sat and Sun the surrounding roads at Hoan Kiem Lake are closed to vehicles). Restaurants, good street food places and a BRGmart are nearby the hotel location.

Our room was kept clean daily and we were happy with our room. The dedicated shower cabinet with a seating platform is much appreciated and also helps to keep the bathroom relatively dry.
Daily room keeping was up to our request. Thank you very much as my wife has sensitive skin condition.

Our room was at the front. So one could hear light traffic noises. The room window was doubled glazed.
For guests who want absolute quietness could choose rooms not facing the street.

We especially enjoyed the daily breakfast. This was the first time we stayed in a hotel with open breakfast kitchen. This is not common. Clean environment and freshly prepared foods. This has been daily highlight for our stay.
The 2 ladies really put their hearts in preparing the foods.
Our appreciation for their daily routine efforts. I deliberately took a picture to share.
We loved the freshly-cut fresh fruits and the freshly prepared bacons. We do not mind a little waiting at times when many guests came in at the same time.
We would return for their breakfast. Not usual to get freshly prepared for a variety of breakfast foods in hotels.
A small note. We like to observe people. The middle aged man was helping to clean the breakfast table( I think his official job was assigned at the lobby. He was helping out because the breakfast area could be busy when many guests come in at the same timing). He should sweep the bread crumbs on to a plate rather than sweeping partially to the floor. The young kitchen lady was doing it correctly.

review.rating: Würde ich wieder in Hanoi buchen!!!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Alles in allem super! Gemütliches Zimmer mit frischen Blumen in einer Vase und tatsächlich auch Rosenblättern auf dem Bett! bequemes Bett und trotz zentraler Lage sehr ruhig auf einer schönen Terrasse/ Balkon. Nettes Personal. Hätte gern verlängert, aber Hotel war ausgebucht.
review.comment_negative: Die Zimmertür ist recht dünn. Als am nächsten Morgen um 06:00 in den anderen Zimmern Bewegung aufkam und man sich anfing gegenseitig an die Türen zu klopfen, um sich zu wecken (war eine kleine asiatische Truppe) war ans schlafen nicht mehr zu denken. Die Armaturen im Bad waren zwar „sauber“, aber sehr verkalkt. Schade, dass man hier wenig in eine Grundreinigung ab und an investiert und somit langfristig das Hotel schmuddelig werden könnte. Bitte bitte, lasst es nicht dazu kommen!

review.rating: I could not have asked or hoped for a better stay than at the exceptional Golden Sun Hotel.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: I literally LOVED every aspect of my stay at Golden Sun.  I stayed there on several occasions as a home base in my month-long travels in Vietnam.  Every aspect of the experience was above and beyond expectations.  Most notably the exceptional, personable, professional and caring staff of this hotel was memorable.  They are on top of every detail, from making sure your room is perfect, to the great, great breakfast offering (both Vietnamese and western cuisine), the bonus coverage of laundry service, arranging rides to and from the airport, travel and sightseeing options (which I didn't use, I already had a plan, but the opportunity was right there).  What stands out is the compassion and character of this hard-working and exceptionally friendly, top-shelf staff.  I cannot recommend the Golden Sun Hotel enough and if you want a place this is so well run, is conveniently located in the Old Quarter, solidly built, quiet and well appointed, then plan you stay around this establishment.  Five BIG stars.  Highly recommended.
review.comment_negative: The wifi was, at times a touch slow, but for the most part, solid and reliable.

review.comment_positive:
Fabulous hotel with beautiful staff.  The room isn't big but it's very clean and comfortable.  The first hotel we have been to in this price range that hasn't looked tired.  
It's in a great location for many of the iconic things to see such as train street.
They serve a very good breakfast.
Tom, Jenny and staff look after you so well.  They even let us store our luggage to tour to Ha Long Bay even though we were not going back to stay.
We booked tours to Ninh Binh and Ha Long Bay through them and the tours were also exceptional.  It really did take the guess work out of which one to choose.  It also meant we had a free pickup from the airport which was great!
Can't praise them enough.  Truly a pleasant stay.
Other thing to note is that we had an inner room and it was lovely and quiet.
Thank you!

review.comment_positive:
Do yourself a favour and come stay at Golden Sun!! I keep coming back because of the wonderful staff, the great position in the city, the quiet at night and the value for money! 
It has a welcoming atmosphere and although the staff work long hours, day in, day out, they still manage to smile and offer help with anything! 
Trips are booked with ease and a fair money exchange too! 
I will keep this hotel as my go to for every Hanoi stay and so should you! 
😘😘😘😘

Μικρό ξενοδοχείο,στην ιδανική τοποθεσία ώστε να μπορείς νά γυρίσεις τά πάντα με τά πόδια, δωμάτια σχετικά άνετα καλά εξοπλισμένα , κρεβάτι μεγάλο με καλό στρώμα,πολύ καλή καθαριότητα καθημερινά, πρωινό σπιτικό και καλύπτει τά πάντα , άριστη σχέση ποιότητας τιμής 
Ο θησαυρός σέ αυτό τό κατάλυμα είναι τό προσωπικό, όλα τά παιδιά είναι πάντα δίπλα σας πρόθυμα για κάθε υπηρεσία και βοήθεια.
Ειδικότερα ο Τομ σας συστήνω ανεπιφύλακτα νά τόν εμπιστευτείτε σέ ότι και αν θέλετε νά σάς οργανώσει θά είναι πραγματικά τό καλύτερο, Τόμ σέ ευχαριστώ πολύ για όλα παιδί μου και σού εύχομαι τά καλύτερα.

review.rating: Super Lage aber Schimmelprobleme in den Zimmern
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Die Lage, das Frühstück und das Personal vor allem der Türsteher/Kofferträger mit Brille sowie das Frühstückspersonal waren super nett.
review.comment_negative: Leider hat das Hotel ein Schimmelproblem. In allen anderen 6 gezeigten Zimmern befand sich schwarzer Schimmelpelz in der Dusche und im Bodenbereich sowie in einigen Zimmern ein richtig weißer Pelz an den Wänden mit Feuchtigkeitsflecken und Ausbeulungen, also im Mauerwerk von innen nach außen. Es roch schimmellig modrig, alles war feucht und mit Duftspray übertünchte man das dann. Die meisten Zimmer verfügen über kein Fenster und zur Strasse mit Fenster wäre es sehr laut. Gleich nach Buchung erhielt ich Ausflugsangebote, ich nahm den Hotelshuttle war. Der Fahrer fuhr sehr agressiv. Jeden Tag wurde ich mehrfach gefragt, ob ich nicht Ausflüge buchen möchte. Ich finde es sehr schade, denn eigentlich hat das Hotel eine super Lage nur kümmert man sich nicht wirklich wie z.B. in einem Zimmer das Silikon in der Duschwanne weg war. Da läuft ja das ganze Wasser in die Wände. Ich habe mir dann für meine weitere Verlängerung ein anderes Hotel gebucht.

review.comment_positive:
結束下龍灣兩天一夜行程後繼續入住本飯店
房間還算大，床鋪舒適，乾淨衛生，室內燈光明亮，插座數量充足，擺放物品的桌面空間足夠
該房間位於三樓，比較沒有浴室水壓不足的問題
飯店位置很好，就在老城區內，非常熱鬧，離多數市區景點皆可步行抵達
夜間沒什麼噪音，但清晨會些微有外面攤販或學校活動的聲音
早餐樸實美味，選擇足夠
飯店人員友善專業親切，能協助預定機場接送、各式各樣的local tour，當我們去下龍灣兩天一夜行程時也幫我們寄放行李

review.comment_positive: We stayed at Golden Sun Hotel for 4 nights and returned for 1 night after a trip to Hoi An. We were thankful they let us leave some luggage behind to pick up on our return. The location is ideal - walking distance to Lake Hoan Kiem, night markets, restaurants and pubs including Ta hien. The rooms are clean and spacious with heaps of storage space and the beds are very comfortable. The Aircon, wifi and shower works perfectly. The showers are quite unique in that they have a separate glass cabinet for toiletries. The breakfast is good with a variety of western and vietnamese food with egg dishes made to order. The staff are just lovely and always welcoming. Tom the Manager is always looking out for guests to make sure they are ok. Hana the lovely receptionist is wonderful too. Together with the other staff including concierge, cleaning and kitchen staff they make a great team and are ever willing to assist and make your stay comfortable.

review.rating: Wonderful stay at Golden Sun Hotel😍
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: We have a nice and wonderful stay here for 2 nights. Their staffs are very friendly and kind. They are willing to give any assistant. They help us to re-heat our foods that we bring from outside, book the bus to and from Ninh Binh and  show the place where we can get stuff or food that we want. This hotel is also located at the centre of the Old quarter and close to many tourist attraction places. But of course require lot of walking workout..lol. I think most of the room have double door..kind of sound-proof door. I have a very good sleep there..maybe too tired I guess..lol...Their breakfast also not bad..basic food and beverages for breakfast. Fully recommended to stay if come to Hanoi.👍

review.rating: Amazing service, fantastic location, great value.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: The staff at this hotel are so helpful and amazing. They messaged us via booking months ahead of time to let us know about tours they could book for us. We did the Ha Long Bay Tour through them and it was great! All of the staff speak good English and greeted us every time we came and left from the hotel. They gave us bottled water every morning even if we didn’t have our room cleaned. The free breakfast is delicious at this hotel, you can get fruit, pho (veggie,chicken,or beef) toast, bacon, eggs, potatoes among other things. The location of this hotel is amazing, it is in the middle of the Old Quarter so you can pretty much walk 20 minutes to any of the major tourist spots. The staff will also give you a map of all the major things to see in the area. The room was very clean and spacious. When we checked out the staff arranged our airport taxi (for a fee) and packed us a breakfast we could take in the taxi since we left early. I can’t recommend this hotel enough if you are coming to Hanoi.

review.rating: We would recommend this hotel to all travellers whole heartedly.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
A property with unbeatable location, short walk to most attractions like the Hoan Kiem Lake and Train Street Eateries. The room was spacious and clean, modern with traditional vibes and had all the essentials including a fully stocked fridge and snacks.

The gentleman who checked us in, Martin I believe his name was, gave us a very warm welcome and assisted us in acquiring a moped to rent which we were providing in the morning. Nancy the Hotel Manager who we saw more of was extremely polite and courteous even allowing me to borrow her own personal rain coat while I drove to purchase my own.

Overall this was a remarkable stay and we are tempted to organise another trip to Vietnam solely to stay here again.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Very good breakfast, particularly for the price point. Friendly staff that are willing to assist you for any issue or request (night staff in particular). Good range of complimentary toiletries, that are refilled every day; and two water bottles as well.
review.comment_negative:
We didn’t sleep in three nights. The first night there was a constant pumping noise in the wall (maybe the neighbouring building), we were kindly offered another room, but the noise was the same.
The second night, very noisy guests in the hallway, which resonates from reception through the staircase and every floor (rooms are definitely not soundproof).
The third, we went to bed with hammering and drilling, and woke up to the same (stopped after 9pm and started at 7am).
Most of all, the room was absolutely NOT what the photos show !
It was not cleaned properly, there was hair on the floor; the walls were filthy and needed a good paint job!!! There was a hole in the ceiling.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

review.rating: Prachtig hotel in het oude stadsdeel van Hanoi.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Het personeel is heel aardig en bereidt je met van alles te helpen.
Op booking stond foute informatie over de kamer. De kamer zou uitzicht op de straat hebben. Dit bleek niet het geval te zijn. De meeste kamers hebben via de douche een raam. De informatie op booking zou aangepast worden .  Het misverstand werd keurig opgelost.met voordeel voor ons..De kamer is heel netjes en schoon en er is een prachtige badkamer met een douchecabine..
Het bed was erg groot  ,echt een kingsize.
Het ontbijt bestaat uit buffet en is erg uitgebreid.: warme gerechten, broodjes etc. Het is echt een goed ontbijt..
Het hotel is centraal gelegen in de oude wijk. Vlakbij het meer.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is close to the old city, but in an alley behind the business district, and the alley is very dark at night.
The lady who served breakfast was very polite and gentle,and another male waiter (wearing glasses) helped open the door and pick up the luggage quickly.
飯店距離老城區商圈近,但在後巷處,深夜非常暗,要注意安全。女士服務員很親切友善，開門的男服務員（戴眼鏡）動作迅速
review.comment_negative:
The twin room is very narrow (my brother is 183cm tall and needs to be very careful not to fall under the bed when he rolls over, but also to be careful not to hit the family members next to him).
雙床房型的床非常窄，床與床連接再一起，翻身須注意不要摔下床，也要注意不要打到隔壁床的親友。
The waiter (a man in charge) was very aggressive, had a bad tone, and didn't smile at all.But when you check out, he suddenly becomes smiling and kindly wants to teach you how to use your mobile phone to give him a five-star review on 'booking'
入住時，一位主要負責的男服務員（看起來像主管）態度很差，口氣也不好，但當你準備退房的時候，他突然會變得有笑容，突然親切要教導你如何使用手機在'booking"給他五顆星評價...

review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten für die beiden letzten Nächte unserer Reise das Familienzimmer mit Terrassse gebucht. Das Zimmer ist sehr groß. Gewöhnungsbedürftig ist lediglich die offene Dusche (kein Vorhang, keine Verglasung) mit dem WC im hinteren Bereich.....Das man keine feuchten Füße bekommt, sind Badeschuhe vorhanden, die man nutzen muss, bis das Bad wieder komplett getrocknet ist.
Frühstück war sehr gut. Das Personal ist super freudlich und sehr hilfsbereit.
Das Hotel ist sehr zu empfehlen. Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis ist sehr gut.

Suite Gia Đình Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Firstly, the staff at this hotel are exceptional - all of them from reception to kitchen to cleaners. Shout out to Linh, Luong, Hou, Thuy, Lien, Dat and others whose name I didn't manage to catch. Special thanks to Linh who made sure my husband had custard balls in the mornings and to Luong who liaise with the airline to make sure we got our luggage as they didn't make it onto the flight. It was such a relief to be able to leave it in Luong's hands.For the price point (mid range for Old Quarter) cutomer service was 5 stars, facilities everything you would expect it to be at this price point. We were in room 603 - big and spacious and right opposite the balcony which was perfect for chilling and enjoying the cocophanus sounds of the Old Quarter, especially since our room didn't have a view (although there was some natural light penetrating the room). Minimal noise as hotel is on a quieter street. Perfect location and service. Extended our stay here by 2 nights.
review.comment_negative: A small downside is not having a view from inside the room but the size and direct access to the balcony more than made up for it (just a quirk in the design). If a view is important to you then state this at the time of booking.I would suggest an upgrade on the big art pieces in the room as the grey is a bit dated. It's an easy way to add colour and inspiration as well as show casing Vietnam/Hanoi. Again, not a big deal.

We had a great room at the very top with two large double beds, perfectly suited for a family with to children. We paid c. 1.1m VND per night incl. breakfast. For the price the hotel is really great. The breakfast buffet was fairly large for the price of the hotel. The hotel was very helpful to arrange trips and even keep our luggage for another day when we were traveling back through Hanoi again. I would come back anytime again.

review.comment_positive:
The hotel is close to the old city, but in an alley behind the business district, and the alley is very dark at night.
The lady who served breakfast was very polite and gentle,and another male waiter (wearing glasses) helped open the door and pick up the luggage quickly.
飯店距離老城區商圈近,但在後巷處,深夜非常暗,要注意安全。女士服務員很親切友善，開門的男服務員（戴眼鏡）動作迅速
review.comment_negative:
the twin Room is very narrow (my brother is 183cm tall and needs to be very careful not to fall under the bed when he rolls over, but also to be careful not to hit the family members next to him).
雙床房型的床非常窄，床與床連接再一起，翻身須注意不要摔下床，也要注意不要打到隔壁床的親友。
The waiter (a man in charge) was very aggressive, had a bad tone, and didn't smile at all.But when you check out, he suddenly becomes smiling and kindly wants to teach you how to use your mobile phone to give him a five-star review on 'booking'
入住時，一位主要負責的男服務員（看起來像主管）態度很差，口氣也不好，但當你準備退房的時候，他突然會變得有笑容，突然親切要教導你如何使用手機在'booking"給他五顆星評價...

review.comment_positive:
- Incredible front of house staff. Tom was efficient, friendly and capable toward all our needs/questions.
- Booked trips that comfortable and appropriately priced trips through the hotel and was happy with quality.
- Breakfast was the best. so much choice. different menu each day and endless amount! Did not need to eat for rest of the day.
- Close to main old quarters attractions, but quiet street for sleeping.
- Shower was hot and pressure great. Room size appropriate for a couple. Bed was comfortable and room dark for sleep.

Again, thank you Tom. We will recommend in the future.

review.rating: Staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful. Room was great value for money!
review.room_type: Phòng Gia Đình Với Sân Hiên
review.comment_positive:
The room was super spacious and great value for money. We had such a cool view of the city of Hanoi and the general hustle and bustle of a proper local street that seemed to house tourists and locals alike. Great amenities, such as free drinking water (You learn to appreciate that gesture quickly in Vietnam). Bathroom was clean and functional. 

The staff were super helpful, including suggesting nearby places to explore while we waited for our room (we were early), as well as booking affordable transport for us from the airport as well as a shuttle bus that took us to our next location. Unbelievably helpful - they went above and beyond!
review.comment_negative: The only downside was that they couldn't accommodate our early arrival, but I consider that to be as much my responsibility as well as the hotel's. Their hands were tied by the time we got there considering they were fully booked, but I don't think I was explicitly told it wasn't possible until we arrived, at which point they said if I had preemptively booked two nights it would have been feasible - by which point it was too late. Ultimately though, a small blip considering when we got to our rooms it was absolutely worth the wait!

Hotel muy céntrico, en el Old Quarter de Hanoi, cerca caminado de la mayoría de atractivos turísticos de la ciudad. El personal muy atento, amable y siempre con una sonrisa. Estaban siempre disponibles vía whatsapp, incluso nos ayudaron hablando con el conductor de nuestro bus que no hablaba inglés.
Habitación grande y cómoda. Baño muy bien, todo muy limpio. Desayuno muy bien con zumos naturales, fruta y opciones orientales y occidentales. Muy recomendable!

review.comment_positive: The staff was very attentive and helpful. The room was very nice and clean, AC, soft beds, and a nice bathroom. Great value for what you get. Breakfast was also great! Highly recommend staying here when you're in Hanoi.

review.comment_positive: L'hotel è ubicato nel cuore di Hanoi, nell'old quarter, in una zona vivace e vitale. Il personale è gentile e disponibile e cerca di accontentare le richieste del turista più esigente. Su richiesta si può organizzare un servizio taxi da e per l'aeroporto ad un prezzo ragionevole. La colazione è varia e abbondante. La struttura è efficiente e moderna. Consigliato.

review.comment_positive: Rooms with bathroom are quite big and quite clean. Some rooms are to the backside with no windows, but also no problem. The staff is very, very friendly and helpful. Also trips, airport taxi, etc. can be booked. Nice and good buffet with coffee, tea, toast, butter, jam, fruits, bacon, etc. and additional food from the menu, e.g. pho or fried eggs. The hotel is located in the old quarter just a few minutes form Hoan Kiem Lake; so everything in the center is in walking distance. I have been there during my last Vietnam trip 2019 (before Corona). The hotel was and ist still very good and I can really recommend this hotel! :)

review.rating: Helpful staff and good value for money!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The staff are super helpful. Shout out to Linh, she was very friendly and made us feel very welcomed. The staff had organised our tour of Ninh Binh + hotel drop off and pick up seamlessly. They even held our suitcase for the 2 nights we were away in Ha Long Bay. 
The Hotel situated on a more quieter street and  is less than 5 mins was from the busy shopping street. This was definitely moneys worth and you get a great staff to help you out if your totally new to Vietnam. 
Overall the room was clean and easy access with elevator.  Breakfast was descent but the coffee was very good.
review.comment_negative: The beds are quiet firm.

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Deluxe
review.comment_positive: Very nice central location, walking distance to many attractions. Staff went above and beyond with their service. One staff member, Tom, organised several trips for us,  including transport. They provided us space to rest for free between trips and were very very friendly. Best service we have ever had from a hotel! Highly recommend!

review.comment_positive: This was the first hotel I stayed at when I arrived in Hanoi. It felt really friendly, with shiny chandeliers, and the staff assisted me with my bags because it was raining. The room was well-lit and very clean. Everything seemed new and fresh. The hotel wasn't directly on the main road by the lake, but it was just two rows behind, which made it quieter. The nearby shops had a charming vibe. I would definitely suggest this hotel – 100%!

review.comment_positive:
Das Hotel ist sehr gut gelegen. Das Personal im Hotel ist super nett und kümmert sich um den Gast in jeder Hinsicht.
Die Ausstattung der Zimmer ist sehr gut. Am Frühstück gab es nichts auszusetzen, es gab frisches Obst,  Eier, Brötchen, Marmelade, Käse, Wurst , Saft- also alles was dazugehört. Wir haben hier mehrmals hier übernachtet (18./14.4.2023) vor unserem Transfer nach SAPA und die Nacht vor unserer Weiterreise nach TAM COC (23./24.4.2023).  Ich empfehle das Hotel.

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
We were a group of 8 people who stayed in this hotel for 4 nights in total. The hotel is located in the old quarter
and thus is an excellent location for tourists. We arrived at Hanoi airport around 2 AM and the hotel arranged a vehicle to pick us up from the airport. The staff is friendly and spoke decent English. The breakfast was good.
We had an early morning flight and since we had to leave the hotel well before the breakfast timings, Tom arranged
packed breakfast for us.

review.rating: We enjoyed our stay at the Golden Sun Hotel and would recommend this hotel !!!
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Very good hotel located right in the middle of Ha Noi, Old Town.  Close proximity to everything, many restaurants close by; only 5 minutes walk to the lake. Excellent staff; everyone was so friendly and very helpful.  Very good breakfast with freshly made to order food: pho, omelet, eggs...  The beds were big and comfortable. Even though the hotel is located on a busy street with a school across the street, you could barely hear the noises when you are in the room.  Good shower with strong pressure and hot water.  Management were very helpful and they helped to book transportation for us to get to the airport.  On our last day, we were able to leave our luggage at the hotel (after we checked out) and explored the town for a few hours before we went to the airport.
review.comment_negative:
We stayed in 2 rooms: Deluxe Family Suite (5th floor) and Double Room with City View (2nd floor).  The wi-fi internet on the 5th floor was good; but the wi-fi internet on the 2nd floor was slow and inconsistent.  Hotel staff were very helpful; but there weren't much they could do improve the wi-fi internet on 2nd floor.  

With 4 people stayed in the Deluxe Family Suite, it would be nice if there is a bigger table in the room.

review.rating: コスパ良く旧市街をブラブラするには最適！
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
「Golden Sun Hotel」は、素晴らしいロケーションを誇るハノイのホテルでした。特に旧市街に位置しており、観光や散策に最適な場所にあります。ホテル周辺の雰囲気を楽しみながら、旧市街をブラブラする事ができる素晴らしい環境です。
事前にリクエストした静かなお部屋も快く提供していただき、表通りに面していない奥の部屋に宿泊できた事は大変ありがたかったです。そのおかげで、ハノイ名物の車やバイクの騒音を気にする事なく、静かで心地良い環境での滞在が可能でした。質の良い睡眠が得られたのは大きなプラスポイントでした。
スタッフの対応も印象的で、常にフレンドリーかつ親切でした。質問や要望にも迅速に対応してくれ、滞在中に安心感を感じさせてくれました。
朝食の品揃えもまあまあで、自分は毎朝Phoをリクエストして、朝からベトナムを感じる事ができました。
総合的に、「Golden Sun Hotel」はハノイでの滞在において平均点以上の選択肢であると感じました。便利なロケーション、静かな環境、そして心地よいサービスが揃っており、再訪もありかなと思えるホテルでした。
review.comment_negative: 特になし！

review.room_type: Suite Gia Đình Deluxe
review.comment_positive:
아침식사도 좋았구요. 직원들이 너무 친절해서 좋았어요. 특히나 사장처럼 보이시는 분은 비 많이 오는데 우리에게 우비까지 사주시면서 잘 챙겨주셨어요. 감동 ㅠ ㅠ 그리고 위치가 일단 대박 입니다! 
진짜 호안끼엠 호수 근처라 주변에 맛집들 부터 주요 명소를 다 걸어갈 수 있어요.
주변에 맛집, 시장, 쇼핑 할 곳이 너무 많아서 너무 너무 좋았어요. 
숙소도 깔끔하고 침대도 편안했습니다.
review.comment_negative:
아쉬웠던 점은 수압이 조금 약했던 건데. 이것 빼고는 특별히 문제 될 것이 없었어요. 
발코니가 있어서 일행 중 한명이 담배를 피우는데 더 좋아했네요 ㅎㅎ 
조식도 매우 만족스러웠어요.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Everything was great. It was a wonderful experience. The staff was extremely helpful and very kind. I would definitely stay here again because the staff made our experience in Hanoi so much better. This was a great hotel! I cant say it enough! Great location and beautiful interior. The rooms were nice and the top floor balcony was a fantastic place to relax at the end of the day. I stayed here for about 5 days with my wife and her family and we all enjoyed it. The hotel itself was fantastic but  staff was probably the best thing about the hotel. they were always willing to help with luggage and logistics of travel and other excursions. If you like clean rooms, beautiful interiors, a welcoming atmosphere, and fantastic customer service, this is the place for you. 10/10
